content: hook into the same stitch yo and draw up a loop yo and pull through 1 loop on the hook there should now be 3 loops on the hook yo and pull through all remaining hooks note your bbl may puff to the inside of the piece gently press the inside of the stitch to puff it outward before stuffing and closing up the piece additional stitch decrease - single_crochet 2 together aka decrease this will decrease 2 stitches into 1 how to do the stitch insert the hook in the next st yo and draw up a loop there should be two loops on the hook insert the hook in the next st yo and draw up a loop there should be three loops on the hook yo and draw through all 3 loops on the hook to complete the stitch i use 10mm plastic safety eyes but you can substitute any eyes you have on hand that won t slip through the stitches or use black yarn to embroider eyes instead which would make the plush safer for all ages work in a spiral or slip_stitch to join at the end of each round based on your preference instead of a magic_ring you can chain 4 and slip_stitch to the first chain to create a ring to work into pattern continued round 1 create a magic_ring and work 6 single_crochet into the ring 6 round 2 work 2 single_crochet into each st around 12 round 3 single_crochet into each st around 12 round 4 single_crochet into each st around 12 round 5 single_crochet into each st around 12 in the 4th stitch work a bbl instead of a regular single_crochet round 6 single_crochet into each st around 12 in the 11th stitch work a bbl instead of a regular single_crochet round 7 single_crochet into each st around 12 in the 8th stitch work a bbl instead of a regular single_crochet round 8 single_crochet into each st around 12 in the 2nd stitch work a bbl instead of a regular single_crochet round 9 single_crochet into each st around 12 in the 6th stitch work a bbl instead of a regular single_crochet round 10 single_crochet into each st around 12 in the 10th stitch work a bbl instead of a regular single_crochet pattern continued round 11 single_crochet into each st around 12 round 12 single_crochet into each st around 12 round 13 single_crochet into each st around 12 place the eyes if using safety eyes this is a good point at which to place them find a space on the piece in between rounds 11 and 12 and place the eyes 2 to 3 stitches part if using yarn to sew them on they can be placed later when adding details after closing round 14 decrease 6 times 6 leave a tail for finishing close up the piece using the finishing tail and yarn needle whip stitch through each stitch of
